description: This thick and filling split pea soup is perfect vegetarian comfort food.
keywords: Pea soup,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Halal,Vegetarian,Vegan,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Ukrainian Split Pea Soup Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1.5L vegetable stock, made with 2 stock cubes

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the oil in a large, deep pot and cook the onions, celery and carrot for 5 minutes. Add the bay leaf and pour over the stock.

Tip in the split peas and season well. Bring to the boil, reduce the heat to low and simmer for 1 hour, stir in the potatoes and cook for 20 minutes more, until the split peas and potatoes are tender. Remove the bay leaf and serve.
